languages.text: {n}Паскаль кажется удивленным.{/n} "Почему? Техна-лингва ритмична и обладает обширным смысловым набором. А некоторые ее наречия особенно звучны и подходят для индивидуального или симфонического исполнения".

{n}Pasqal looks surprised.{/n} "Why not? Techna-Lingua is rhythmical and possesses a broad semantic scope. And some of its more sonorous dialects lend themselves well to individual and symphonic declamation."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль кажется удивленным.{/n} "Почему? Техна-лингва ритмична и обладает обширным смысловым набором. А некоторые ее наречия особенно звучны и подходят для индивидуального или симфонического исполнения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal looks surprised.{/n} "Why would there not be? Techna-Lingua is rhythmical and possesses a broad semantic scope. And some of its more sonorous dialects lend themselves well to individual and symphonic recitals."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは驚いた様子だ。{/n}「なぜ、ないと？テクナ・リングアはリズミカルで意味論的な範囲は広い。そしてその一部のより拡張高い方言は個別のおよびシンフォニックな宣言に役立ちます」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks surprised.{/n} "Why not? Techna-Lingua is rhythmical and possesses a broad semantic scope. And some of its more sonorous dialects lend themselves well to individual and symphonic declamation."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは驚いた様子だ。{/n}「なぜ、ないと？テクナ・リングアはリズミカルで意味論的な範囲は広い。そしてその一部のより拡張高い方言は個別のおよびシンフォニックな宣言に役立ちます」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡看起来很惊讶。{/n}“怎么会呢？科技之语拥有出色的节奏感与广博的语义范围，它的某些较为响亮的方言版本，非常适合改编成个人演奏与交响乐。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks surprised.{/n} "Why not? Techna-Lingua is rhythmical and possesses a broad semantic scope. And some of its more sonorous dialects lend themselves well to individual and symphonic declamation."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡看起来很惊讶。{/n}“为什么会这么想呢？科技之语拥有出色的节奏感与广博的语义范围，它的某些较为响亮的方言版本，非常适合改编成个人演奏与交响乐。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal wirkt überrascht.{/n} "Warum nicht? Die Lingua technis ist rhythmisch und verfügt über eine große semantische Bandbreite. Und einige ihrer sonoreren Dialekte eignen sich gut für individuelle und symphonische Deklamationen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks surprised.{/n} "Why not? Techna-Lingua is rhythmical and possesses a broad semantic scope. And some of its more sonorous dialects lend themselves well to individual and symphonic declamation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal wirkt überrascht.{/n} "Weshalb sollte es keine geben? Die Lingua technis ist rhythmisch und verfügt über eine große semantische Bandbreite. Und einige ihrer sonoreren Dialekte eignen sich gut für individuelle und symphonische Vorträge."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal a l'air surpris.{/n} « Pourquoi pas ? Le Techna-Lingua est un langage rythmique couvrant un large spectre sémantique et certains de ses dialectes les plus sonores se prêtent admirablement bien aux déclamations individuelles et symphoniques. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks surprised.{/n} "Why not? Techna-Lingua is rhythmical and possesses a broad semantic scope. And some of its more sonorous dialects lend themselves well to individual and symphonic declamation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal a l'air surpris.{/n} « En quoi est-ce incompatible ? Le Techna-Lingua est un langage rythmique couvrant un large spectre sémantique et certains de ses dialectes les plus sonores se prêtent admirablement bien aux récitals individuels et symphoniques. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal parece sorprendido.{/n} «¿Por qué no? La tecnolingua es rítmica y posee amplios campos semánticos. Y algunos de sus dialectos más sonoros se prestan muy bien a declamaciones individuales y sinfónicas».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks surprised.{/n} "Why not? Techna-Lingua is rhythmical and possesses a broad semantic scope. And some of its more sonorous dialects lend themselves well to individual and symphonic declamation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal parece sorprendido.{/n} «¿Por qué no iba a haberlos? La tecnolingua es rítmica y posee amplios campos semánticos. Y algunos de sus dialectos más sonoros se prestan muy bien a recitales individuales y sinfónicos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, şaşırmış görünüyor.{/n} "Neden olmasın? Lingua Techna, ritmik olup geniş bir semantik yelpazesine sahiptir. Gür biçemlerinden bazıları da bireysel ve senfonik hitabet biçimlerine oldukça yakışabilmektedir."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks surprised.{/n} "Why not? Techna-Lingua is rhythmical and possesses a broad semantic scope. And some of its more sonorous dialects lend themselves well to individual and symphonic declamation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal şaşırmış görünüyor.{/n} "Neden olmasın? Lingua Techna ritmiktir ve geniş bir semantik yelpazeye sahiptir. Diğerlerinden daha gür biçemlerinden bazıları da bireysel ve senfonik hitabet biçimlerine oldukça yakışabilmektedir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
